home.feature2Desc: Flexibly adjust size and quality to meet different needs
home.feature3Desc: Download or copy to clipboard for easy sharing

about.title: About Video2GIF
about.privacyContent: Video2GIF processes videos locally in your browser by default and does not upload your source videos. We do not collect any content data, only anonymous performance metrics and error logs to improve the product.
about.offlineContent: This app supports PWA (Progressive Web App) and can be installed on your device for offline use. Basic pages and recently used presets are cached.
about.opensourceContent: This project uses the following open source projects: FFmpeg, ffmpeg.wasm, Astro, React, Tailwind CSS, etc.

support.title: FAQ & Support
support.a1: Almost all common video formats are supported, including MP4, MOV, AVI, MKV, WebM, MPEG, FLV, MTS, M2TS, 3GP, etc.
support.q2: Is there a file size limit?
support.a2: For best performance, we recommend using video files no larger than 200MB. Larger files may require longer processing time.
support.a3: Yes! This app supports PWA and can be used offline after installation.
support.q4: Are videos uploaded to a server?
support.a4: No. All conversions are done locally in your browser, and we do not upload your video files.
support.feedbackHint: If you have any questions or suggestions, please contact us via email.
